title: The Martial Spirit Continues - The Journey Never Ends: "A journey of a thousand miles starts with a single step" Lau Tzu
description: The book will take the reader through many steps of growth and accomplishment through Martial arts as well as TV production and achieving goals. This is presented along with steps to help make your goals a reality. In the last part of the book, she takes the reader along with her to enjoy the journey to Okinawa representing both the United States and Isshinryu Karate. "Sensei has shown me that "The journey never ends", and that if you follow your dreams with a plan and keep taking one step after another on that journey, you will be able to do anything you put your heart to." Alan Freedman - Dir. Jewish Sports Heritage. "I was impressed with Marilyn's Humility, her dedication, and her expertise" Damien Martin -Okinawan Gojuryu Kenkyukai Australia. "When you look at the life of Marilyn Fierro, she personifies the spirit of America." Felix J. Grucci - Former United States Congressman 1st Congressional District
author: Marilyn Fierro
